title: Brand Storii forays into West Bengal with launch of Storii Devasom Spa & Resort, Kolkata
description: Speaking on the launch, Ravi Todi, director, South City Group, said the prime location of Storii Kolkata offers the perfect retreat for relaxation and revitalization. "Yet another magnificent development by South City Group. We have chosen ITC Hotels to manage the property given their excellence in hospitality," he added.
